column6: Phnom Penh Office of Immigration Investigation and Procedure received a Chinese man
column8: a 29-year-old male from police in Khan 7 Makara.------The man
column10: had been staying at Donggangangji Hotel and not paid his bills. He arrived at the Kingdom of Cambodia on 12.12-2018
column11: on a tourist visa. As he has no current passport
column12: no work and no place to stay
column13: he was arrested and sent to the Department of Immigration to carry out proceedings.------Source: Phnom Penh Police
